[et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” background_image=”https://birthtissuerecovery.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/12/BTR-Hospital-Workflow.jpg” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row column_structure=”3_5,2_5″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”bottom” animation_intensity_slide=”8%” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”3_5″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”2_5″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” text_text_color=”#FFFFFF” header_2_text_align=”right” header_2_text_color=”#FFFFFF” header_2_font_size=”42px” header_2_line_height=”1.5em” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Our Hospital Partners

Our hospital partnerships are unique and professional relationships between each hospital and Birth Tissue Recovery. We build careful, long term relationships that allow both the hospital and BTR to build an acquisition program designed to seamlessly integrate into each hospitals’ unique work flow.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ custom_padding_last_edited=”on|desktop” admin_label=”Section” module_id=”patient_experience” _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”7px||20px|||” custom_padding_tablet=”50px|0|50px|0″ custom_padding_phone=”” transparent_background=”off” padding_mobile=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row padding_mobile=”off” column_padding_mobile=”on” admin_label=”Row” _builder_version=”4.16″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” custom_padding=”0px|0px” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Title: An Innovative Patient Experience” _builder_version=”4.25.0″ text_text_color=”#92278f” text_font_size=”20″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” custom_margin=”0px|||” custom_padding=”0px|||” use_border_color=”off” border_color=”#ffffff” border_style=”solid” global_colors_info=”{}”]

 

An Innovative Patient Experience

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ custom_padding_last_edited=”on|desktop” admin_label=”section” _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”0px||50px|” custom_padding_tablet=”50px|0|50px|0″ custom_padding_phone=”” transparent_background=”off” padding_mobile=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row padding_mobile=”off” column_padding_mobile=”on” admin_label=”row” _builder_version=”4.16″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” custom_padding=”0px|0px” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Purpose” _builder_version=”4.25.0″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” use_border_color=”off” border_color=”#ffffff” border_style=”solid” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Research indicates that donating birth tissue enhances the patient experience. In fact, a few of our donors have been tissue recipients and some are repeat donors, having donated more than 2 times.

9 out of 10 patients agree to donate

 

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ custom_padding_last_edited=”on|desktop” admin_label=”section” _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”0px||50px|” custom_padding_tablet=”50px|0|50px|0″ custom_padding_phone=”” transparent_background=”off” padding_mobile=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row padding_mobile=”off” column_padding_mobile=”on” admin_label=”row” _builder_version=”4.16″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” custom_padding=”0px|0px” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Purpose” module_class=”subhead” _builder_version=”4.16″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” use_border_color=”off” border_color=”#ffffff” border_style=”solid” global_colors_info=”{}”]

We integrate seamlessly

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ custom_padding_last_edited=”on|desktop” admin_label=”section” _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”0px||50px|” custom_padding_tablet=”50px|0|50px|0″ custom_padding_phone=”” transparent_background=”off” padding_mobile=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row padding_mobile=”off” column_padding_mobile=”on” admin_label=”row” _builder_version=”4.16″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” custom_padding=”0px|0px” hover_enabled=”0″ global_colors_info=”{}” sticky_enabled=”0″][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Purpose” _builder_version=”4.25.0″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” hover_enabled=”0″ use_border_color=”off” border_color=”#ffffff” border_style=”solid” global_colors_info=”{}” sticky_enabled=”0″]

Your birth center will be assigned dedicated and trained personnel to align our process to your workflow. Everything from prep work to collection of tissue to managing credentials and electronic records will be handled by our team.

Patient Requirements

  • Informed consent to donate
  • Completion of medical and social history questionnaire
  • Small blood sample to be tested
  • Vaginal or C-section delivery

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ custom_padding_last_edited=”on|desktop” admin_label=”section” _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”0px||50px|” custom_padding_tablet=”50px|0|50px|0″ custom_padding_phone=”” transparent_background=”off” padding_mobile=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row padding_mobile=”off” column_padding_mobile=”on” admin_label=”row” _builder_version=”4.16″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” custom_padding=”0px|0px” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Purpose” module_class=”subhead” _builder_version=”4.16″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” use_border_color=”off” border_color=”#ffffff” border_style=”solid” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Birth Tissue Recovery is the Nation’s Leading Birth Tissue and Placenta Donation Program

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ custom_padding_last_edited=”on|desktop” admin_label=”section” _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”0px||50px|” custom_padding_tablet=”50px|0|50px|0″ custom_padding_phone=”” transparent_background=”off” padding_mobile=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row padding_mobile=”off” column_padding_mobile=”on” admin_label=”row” _builder_version=”4.16″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” custom_padding=”0px|0px” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Purpose” module_class=”subhead” _builder_version=”4.16″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” use_border_color=”off” border_color=”#ffffff” border_style=”solid” global_colors_info=”{}”]

We seek to partner with hospitals to build donation programs – a 100% voluntary opportunity for mothers to participate at no cost.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ custom_padding_last_edited=”on|desktop” admin_label=”section” _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”0px||50px|” custom_padding_tablet=”50px|0|50px|0″ custom_padding_phone=”” transparent_background=”off” padding_mobile=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,1_3,1_3″ _builder_version=”4.25.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_image src=”https://birthtissuerecovery.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/02/FDA-Logo.png” title_text=”FDA-Logo” _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

FDA and HIPAA
Compliant Institution

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

12+

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

12+ years as the Nation’s Leading Birth Tissue and Placenta Donation Program

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_image src=”https://birthtissuerecovery.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/02/AATB_Logo.png” title_text=”AATB_Logo” _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

American Association of Tissue Banks Accredited Institution

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ custom_padding_last_edited=”on|desktop” admin_label=”Section” module_id=”hospital_faq” _builder_version=”4.16″ background_color=”#fbf4ff” custom_padding=”0px|||” custom_padding_tablet=”50px|0|50px|0″ custom_padding_phone=”” transparent_background=”off” padding_mobile=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row padding_mobile=”off” column_padding_mobile=”on” admin_label=”Row” _builder_version=”4.16″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” custom_padding=”80px|0px” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Title: FAQs” _builder_version=”4.16″ text_font=”|on|||” text_text_color=”#ffffff” text_font_size=”20″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” use_border_color=”off” border_color=”#ffffff” border_style=”solid” global_colors_info=”{}”]

FAQ’s On Placenta Donation Programs

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row padding_mobile=”off” column_padding_mobile=”on” admin_label=”Row” _builder_version=”4.16″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” custom_padding=”50px|50px” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”0px|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_toggle title=”How does BTR assure the privacy of patient records?” open_toggle_background_color=”#ffffff” closed_toggle_background_color=”#fbf4ff” admin_label=”How does BTR assure the privacy of patient records?” _builder_version=”4.25.0″ title_line_height=”1.3em” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” border_width_all=”1px” border_color_all=”#dbdbdb” border_style_all=”solid” use_border_color=”on” border_color=”#dbdbdb” border_style=”solid” global_colors_info=”{}”]

BTR executes an agreement that requires BTR compliance with HIPAA regulations and hospital policies regarding privacy. All information is kept strictly confidential and no identifying information is shared with anyone, except where required by law. To protect privacy, we will keep all information that contains personal identifiers confidential and in a secure location, with access allowed only to authorized BTR personnel. We will not identify patients in any publications.

[/et_pb_toggle][et_pb_toggle title=”How do you ensure that BTR activities will not interfere with hospital workflow?” open_toggle_background_color=”#ffffff” closed_toggle_background_color=”#fbf4ff” admin_label=”How do you ensure that BTR activities will not interfere with hospital workflow?” _builder_version=”4.25.0″ title_line_height=”1.3em” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” border_width_all=”1px” border_color_all=”#dbdbdb” border_style_all=”solid” use_border_color=”on” border_color=”#dbdbdb” border_style=”solid” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Once we reach an agreement with a hospital, BTR selects and carefully trains a highly professional individual to serve as a placenta donor coordinator. BTR’s placenta donor coordinators have excellent situational awareness and interpersonal skills with which they time and conduct themselves in a way that doesn’t interfere with workflow or cause delays.

[/et_pb_toggle][et_pb_toggle title=”What do patients think about placenta donation?” open_toggle_background_color=”#ffffff” closed_toggle_background_color=”#fbf4ff” admin_label=”What do patients think about placenta donation?” _builder_version=”4.25.0″ title_line_height=”1.3em” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” border_width_all=”1px” border_color_all=”#dbdbdb” border_style_all=”solid” use_border_color=”on” border_color=”#dbdbdb” border_style=”solid” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Our consent rate exceeds 90%. The vast majority of women and their families intuitively recognize the altruistic value of granting permission for their afterbirth to be used for creation of wound care products. Especially, when one considers the alternative is for it to be discarded.

[/et_pb_toggle][et_pb_toggle title=”What do nurses and physicians think about Birth Tissue Recovery?” open_toggle_background_color=”#ffffff” closed_toggle_background_color=”#fbf4ff” admin_label=”What do nurses and physicians think about Birth Tissue Recovery?” _builder_version=”4.25.0″ title_line_height=”1.3em” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” border_width_all=”1px” border_color_all=”#dbdbdb” border_style_all=”solid” use_border_color=”on” border_color=”#dbdbdb” border_style=”solid” global_colors_info=”{}”]

We make every effort prior to initiating the program to educate nursing and medical staff about the donation process, use of tissue, and address any questions or concerns. We attempt to incrementally implement the program to give time to receive feedback and refine the process as it is going forward. Nurses and physicians recognize the value of tissue donation and the enhanced patient experience this opportunity provides their patients.

[/et_pb_toggle][et_pb_toggle title=”Why do you need access to patients’ records?” open_toggle_background_color=”#ffffff” closed_toggle_background_color=”#fbf4ff” admin_label=”Why do you need access to patients’ records?” _builder_version=”4.25.0″ title_line_height=”1.3em” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” border_width_all=”1px” border_color_all=”#dbdbdb” border_style_all=”solid” use_border_color=”on” border_color=”#dbdbdb” border_style=”solid” global_colors_info=”{}”]

A mother qualifies to donate if she does not have any diseases that could be passed on to a patient who receives transplant products made from the birth tissues. The medical record review is one tool in BTR’s donor screening and safety assessment process.

[/et_pb_toggle][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ custom_padding_last_edited=”on|desktop” admin_label=”Section” _builder_version=”4.16″ background_color=”#ffffff” custom_padding=”40px||80px|” custom_padding_tablet=”50px|0|50px|0″ custom_padding_phone=”” transparent_background=”off” padding_mobile=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row admin_label=”Row” _builder_version=”4.16″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_cta title=”Inquire About Our Hospital Programs” button_url=”https://birthtissuerecovery.com/?page_id=434″ button_text=”Contact Us” admin_label=”Contact” _builder_version=”4.16″ header_font=”|on|||” use_background_color=”off” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” custom_button=”on” button_text_color=”#92278f” button_border_color=”#92278f” button_use_icon=”off” background_layout=”light” custom_padding=”10px||10px|” use_border_color=”off” border_color=”#ffffff” border_style=”solid” button_text_color_hover=”#ffffff” button_border_color_hover=”#92278f” button_letter_spacing_hover=”0″ button_bg_color_hover=”#92278f” global_colors_info=”{}” button_text_size__hover_enabled=”off” button_one_text_size__hover_enabled=”off” button_two_text_size__hover_enabled=”off” button_text_color__hover_enabled=”on” button_text_color__hover=”#ffffff” button_one_text_color__hover_enabled=”off” button_two_text_color__hover_enabled=”off” button_border_width__hover_enabled=”off” button_one_border_width__hover_enabled=”off” button_two_border_width__hover_enabled=”off” button_border_color__hover_enabled=”on” button_border_color__hover=”#92278f” button_one_border_color__hover_enabled=”off” button_two_border_color__hover_enabled=”off” button_border_radius__hover_enabled=”off” button_one_border_radius__hover_enabled=”off” button_two_border_radius__hover_enabled=”off” button_letter_spacing__hover_enabled=”on” button_letter_spacing__hover=”0″ button_one_letter_spacing__hover_enabled=”off” button_two_letter_spacing__hover_enabled=”off” button_bg_color__hover_enabled=”on” button_bg_color__hover=”#92278f” button_one_bg_color__hover_enabled=”off” button_two_bg_color__hover_enabled=”off”]

Contact us to learn more about implementing a placenta donation program in your hospital.

[/et_pb_cta][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
